Title: Auto Power Switch
Description: Powers Off System, and Applications. WPF 4.0 project built in Visual Studio 2010.
HomeWiki:
Introduction

This is project developed in WPF 4.0, with Simple Styles. The project is targeted to handle System's power options.

More functions, such as: you could turn off a/some specific application(s).
